Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's okay. Don't be scared.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia and Lee didn't mean to harm you. They were just too anxious.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "They won't do it anymore. You can come out now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why feed a machine...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Sorry, I was too reckless.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A few minutes ago—'}
{3: 'With pale-blue flames coming out of the tailpipe, the tiger-head machine pounced at you. Lucia immediately took action.'}
{3: 'The outstanding mobility of Plume allowed her to quickly get behind the machine. Her right hand slammed down, carefully avoiding the machine\'s blade "ears" and tailpipe flames.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "The tiger head sensed the threat and quickly dived, barely avoiding Lucia's attack."}
{3: "But it only ended up in Lee's trap, completely wrapped inside his blue tactical coat."}
{3: 'Lee had not used any harsh methods as he did not want to break the tiger head. It just dashed around inside the coat cluelessly, trying to find a way out.'}
{3: 'Having no luck, it ended up using the blades to cut an opening again.'}
{3: 'The Construct tactical coat weaved from special materials did not stand a chance. The tiger head soon broke free and hid under a chair.'}
{3: 'It made a shaky, threatening sound.'}
{3: "Seeing the machine's stance, Lee and Lucia stopped taking further action."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I don't think it was going to attack Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Felines often pounce at the person they are close to. That's probably why it did so to Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Even it wasn't hostile, if it hit Commandant with that amount of momentum, Commandant would have to spend tonight on a bed in Star of Life.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing Lee and Lucia were still nearby, the tiger head made a shaky roar.'}
{3: 'It then moved a little further into the shadow under the chair.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What do we do now?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Despite Liv's calming words, the tiger-head machine has not let its guard down. It is no longer trying to run away, but still reluctant to get out of the shadow."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I know you're the bravest. Come out now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv slowly gets back on her feet, looking a little sad.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Sorry, I couldn't get it out.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll give it a try then.", 3: '57'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Sure. Good luck, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You slowly squat down to the same level as the machine and look it in the eyes.'}
{3: 'The tiger head also moves slightly forward, trying to identify the new person.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, try to calm it down. Be gentle.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv lowers her voice behind you, trying not to alert the tiger head.'}
{2: 'Good kitty. Come here...', 3: '68', 4: "Want a treat? I've got some goodies for you!", 5: '70'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Huh? Will tigers like this treat?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It hesitates a bit, then slowly flies out from under the chair.'}
{3: 'But soon makes another sharp noise after seeing Lucia and Lee standing nearby.'}
{3: 'When it realizes they have not taken any further actions, it stops "stepping" back.'}
{3: "The tiger head moves toward you with great caution, frequently turning away to watch Lucia and Lee's actions."}
{3: 'When it finally gets into a safe distance, it immediately leaps into your arms.'}
{3: 'The machine gladly rubs against your chest. Thankfully, the jet engine behind its head is not activated this time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Great. It likes Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But why did Nanami send it here anyway?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I have checked the package. There was no message left.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You pick up the machine to inspect. It calmly allows your hands to move around its body.'}
{3: 'Is it enjoying this?'}
{3: 'When you look right into its red eyes—'}
{2: "Nanami's Voice", 3: 'Beep—Iris recognition passed... What other checks are there? Forget about them. Too much hassle!'}
{2: "Nanami's Voice", 3: 'Identity confirmed: Gray Raven Commandant 【kuroname】.'}
{3: "As a red light scans through your pupils, you hear Nanami's voice from the machine."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's been a long time, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{3: "You see Nanami's hologram in the air."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Surprise! The gift didn't come from the Science Council. It's me, Nanami!", 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '105', 4: "It's quite surprising in a way.", 5: '105'}
{3: 'The hologram is not real-time, but a pre-recorded video.'}
{3: 'So Nanami has not responded to the strange look you give her. Her speech continues.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Now, allow me to introduce my greatest work. Ta-da! Behold, Tiger!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Good! I like your spirit!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You must have already found out that Tiger is a combat booster similar to CUBs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But it can't transform yet, so don't use it for combat.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'If there is a chance, I\'d like to make you a more powerful "Super Tiger"!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Of course, Tiger is more than just a cat. I put a lot of time and energy into it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I have prepared more gifts inside its head. There are many things I'd like to share with you all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But for my own enjoyment... Oops, no, to make Commandant cherish the upcoming festival more, I have also set up some trials related to it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Of course there will be hints! Go check them out with others, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the video comes to an end, Nanami also disappears.'}
{3: 'It started in a rush and ended in one. Just like how she always is.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'So Nanami prepared another gift for us. We need to get her something in return.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I wish I can give her the gift in person.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Nanami is hard to track.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Nanami said there was another gift in Tiger's head. Do we have to dismantle it?", 4: '2'}
{2: "Considering how much Nanami loves her works, I don't think so.", 3: '141', 4: 'Get a screwdriver, Lee!', 5: '145'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Not funny. I don't think she meant that.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'You suddenly receive a verification request in the terminal. The other three Constructs also pause for a moment.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I just received a request to connect to my M.I.N.D.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Huh? I got one too.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Here's a key that I need for verification.", 3: '157'}
{3: 'Looks like this is the proper way to unwrap it.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It feels like we are all unwrapping the gift together.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So, are we connecting?', 4: '3'}
{3: 'After confirming there is still some time before 23:00—'}
{2: 'Gray Ravens, move out!', 3: '163'}
{3: 'Only regular breathing sounds can be heard in the quiet Gray Raven lounge.'}
{3: "Tiger twitches slightly on the table. Nanami's hologram shows up once again."}
{3: 'She first glances at the three Constructs leaning back on the chairs.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You are sleeping so well.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then she looks at the only human in the room.'}
{3: "Nanami rests her hand gently on the human's head. The hologram of her hand goes through the hair—"}
{3: 'Her hand cannot hold anything.'}
{3: 'Still, Nanami gently pats the human, as if the real her is here instead of an illusion.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant, make sure you work hard to find Nanami.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You promised me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "The girl's hologram disappears once again."}
